Subject: [junit] Statement/branch cover=
age?





I'm new to JUnit. From what I have been able to find out so far i=
t appears that JUnit can not report any kind of test coverage statistics ag=
ainst the source (for example statement or branch coverage). Is that true? =
If it is, do you know of a tool that does this for Java? There is such a to=
ol for C++.

Frank Ackerman
Montana Tech
